mapper.select: SELECT DOMAIN_ID , USER_ID , USER_NM , USER_PW , PSNL_NO , BRTH , LUNAR_DIV , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'LUNA' AND CODE = A.LUNAR_DIV) LUNAR_DIV_NM , JOIN_DT , RTRE_DT , CARR_YY , CARR_MM , ZIP_CD_JI , ZIP_CD_DO , ADDR_JI , ADDR_DO , OFFICE_NUM , PHONE_NUM , EMAIL , PHOTO , COOP_ID , IFNULL((SELECT COOP_NM FROM COOP_INFO WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND COOP_ID = A.COOP_ID), '') COOP_NM , BIZ_QUARTER , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'BZQT' AND CODE = A.BIZ_QUARTER) BIZ_QUARTER_NM , USER_PSTN , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'PSTN' AND CODE = A.USER_PSTN) USER_PSTN_NM , EMP_TYPE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'EMPC' AND CODE = A.EMP_TYPE) EMP_TYPE_NM , PMS_AUTH , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'PMAT' AND CODE = A.PMS_AUTH) PMS_AUTH_NM , CURR_PRJT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT PRJT_NM FROM PRJT_INFO WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.CURR_PRJT_ID), '') CURR_PRJT_NM , USER_NO FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{sUSER_NM}, '%');

SELECT DOMAIN_ID , USER_ID , USER_NM , USER_PW , PSNL_NO , BRTH , LUNAR_DIV , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'LUNA' AND CODE = A.LUNAR_DIV) LUNAR_DIV_NM , JOIN_DT , RTRE_DT , CARR_YY , CARR_MM , ZIP_CD_JI , ZIP_CD_DO , ADDR_JI , ADDR_DO , OFFICE_NUM , PHONE_NUM , EMAIL , PHOTO , COOP_ID , IFNULL((SELECT COOP_NM FROM COOP_INFO WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND COOP_ID = A.COOP_ID), '') COOP_NM , BIZ_QUARTER , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'BZQT' AND CODE = A.BIZ_QUARTER) BIZ_QUARTER_NM , USER_PSTN , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'PSTN' AND CODE = A.USER_PSTN) USER_PSTN_NM , EMP_TYPE , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'EMPC' AND CODE = A.EMP_TYPE) EMP_TYPE_NM , PMS_AUTH , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM PMS_COMM_CD WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = '00000000' AND CODE_TYPE = 'PMAT' AND CODE = A.PMS_AUTH) PMS_AUTH_NM , CURR_PRJT_ID , IFNULL((SELECT PRJT_NM FROM PRJT_INFO WHERE DOMAIN_ID = A.DOMAIN_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.CURR_PRJT_ID), '') CURR_PRJT_NM FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND A.USER_ID = #{sUSER_ID};

SELECT B.DOMAIN_ID , B.USER_ID , B.SEQ_NO , B.SCHL_NM , B.SCHL_DEPT , B.GRAD_YYYYMM FROM MEM_INFO A , MEM_SCHL_INFO B WHERE A.DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND A.USER_ID = #{sUSER_ID} AND A.DOMAIN_ID = B.DOMAIN_ID AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID;

SELECT B.DOMAIN_ID , B.USER_ID , B.SEQ_NO , B.CERTIFCT_NM , B.ACQ_YYYYMM , B.PUB_ORG_NM FROM MEM_INFO A , MEM_CERTIFCT_INFO B WHERE A.DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND A.USER_ID = #{sUSER_ID} AND A.DOMAIN_ID = B.DOMAIN_ID AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID;

SELECT B.DOMAIN_ID , B.USER_ID , B.SEQ_NO , B.EDUT_NM , B.EDUT_STRT_DT , B.EDUT_END_DT , B.EDUT_ORG_NM FROM MEM_INFO A , MEM_EDUT_INFO B WHERE A.DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND A.USER_ID = #{sUSER_ID} AND A.DOMAIN_ID = B.DOMAIN_ID AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID;

SELECT B.DOMAIN_ID , B.USER_ID , B.SEQ_NO , B.CORP_NM , B.CORP_JOIN_DT , B.CORP_RTRE_DT , B.LAST_PSTN , B.ASSGN_BIZ FROM MEM_INFO A , MEM_CARR_INFO B WHERE A.DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND A.USER_ID = #{sUSER_ID} AND A.DOMAIN_ID = B.DOMAIN_ID AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID;

SELECT B.DOMAIN_ID , B.USER_ID , B.SEQ_NO , B.PRJT_NM , B.STRT_YYYYMM , B.END_YYYYMM , B.ORDER_ORG_NM , B.EXEC_ORG_NM , B.PRJT_PSTN , B.ASSGN_BIZ , B.SERVER , B.OS , B.PRG_LANG , B.DBMS , B.ETC_INFO FROM MEM_INFO A , MEM_PRJT_CARR_INFO B WHERE A.DOMAIN_ID = #{sDOMAIN_ID} AND A.USER_ID = #{sUSER_ID} AND A.DOMAIN_ID = B.DOMAIN_ID AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID;
